title: Enhanced Communication Channels – Voice Messages for Asynchronous Communication
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to send and receive voice messages asynchronously so that I can efficiently communicate with my patients and their families without interrupting my care routines.

title: Social Interaction Tracking – Customizable Reports for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to generate customizable reports on my patients' social activity trends so that I can spot patterns and better support socially isolated patients.

title: Caregiver Status Updates on User Interactions
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive updates on my patients' interactions with ALFRED so that I can better understand their emotional states and support their social needs remotely.

title: Activity Participation Monitoring – Alerting Caregivers About Missed Activities
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts when my patients miss scheduled social activities so that I can proactively reach out to them and provide support, helping to reduce their feelings of isolation.

title: Cognitive Stimulation through Social Interaction
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to utilize discussion prompts for family conversations so that I can foster emotional connections between my socially isolated patients and their families, enhancing their overall well-being.
